comment.author: 52888316@N07
comment._content: It's sad that the original mats and cases on a lot of these images have been compromised in order the make the photograph more presentable. I used to own this image and it did not have an oval mat. The originality of the image is lost like a lot of these images!!!

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: Thanks for letting us know. We like to add a note to catalog records when we know that the mat or case isn't original stating that the vintage map or case was supplied by the donor.
